# AUDIO::OVERRIDE_PLAYER_GROUND_MATERIAL

## Summary
Set the footstep tuning mode

## Parameters
* **INT** overriddenMaterialHash
* **BOOL** scriptOverrides:
> set it to true to use the mode passed in the modeHash parameter.
> set it to false to stop overriding ( set modeHash to be 0)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets audio flag "OverridePlayerGroundMaterial"
